name: PopStar-free destroy star game
description:
"PopCandy" is a very mental exercise game, and the elimination of traditional class games, players can not mess no brain clearance, each level will be required to achieve a certain score to clearance, otherwise the mess after, score enough, but did not eliminate the object will GAME OVER, so much to say to try to get more points, more points will be superimposed together to eliminate the basis of scores.

Game Features:
- Click on two or more of the same candy
- No time limit, but each level has a target score
- The more you also eliminate the candy, you can get higher points
- Finally, the less the rest of the candy, the more you get rewarded
- You need to think carefully, to get a higher score
